summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for The Haze Trust at Deutsche Bank for January 2019. It details significant deposits, including a large transfer associated with Jeffrey Epstein, and provides information on service charges and account management.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned as the individual associated with a significant funds transfer to The Haze Trust account.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is referenced in the context of providing personal assistance for account inquiries.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein is the account holder associated with The Haze Trust at Deutsche Bank.

events.title: Incoming Funds Transfer
events.description: A significant funds transfer of $6,000,000.00 was made to The Haze Trust account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3 St, Thomas 00802, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The Haze Trust account at Deutsche Bank had a beginning balance of $61,996.82 as of January 1, 2019.
A total of $58,727,941.67 was credited to the account during January 2019.
A significant incoming funds transfer of $6,000,000.00 from Jeffrey Epstein was recorded on January 10, 2019.
The document outlines the process for reporting errors or inquiries related to the account.
No service charges or overdraft fees were incurred during the statement period.
